PART.P: I have recently received your letter informing I won a two-week-holiday prize at the Camp California. Enclosing information you asked for, there are some points, I want to point out.

First of all, I will not have finished my university course until the end of the June so I can only travel in July. I would prefer to stay in tents than log cabins. Since I was a child, I have been intrested in camping and sleeping under the tents.

If I can participate on swimming and photography groups, I will be grateful. I have been swimming for 8 years for a club and enjoying a lot. I am afraid, I am not good at photography but I want to improve it.
I need some more information about the camp life and also I would like to know what I need to take with me. For exemple, how much pocket money will be enough and which kind of clothes I should wear..
I hope to receive your reply soon. I am really looking forward to going this camp.
